Text: I forgot to mention that I stopped at 2056.

Think, Haweri, think. There'll be different teams at the top of each division. Different financial situations due to buyouts etc. Different expectations from the board because each team will be in different situations than in a brand new game, etc etc.

Get it now?

For clarification when I say NOTHING has been changed on any of the teams I mean this:

I put him on holidays
